Carrol Boyes bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe, nwanyị na-azụ ahịa, na onye nkụzi mbụ nke a maara nke ọma dị ka onye guzobere Carrol Boyes Kitchen na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe eji esi nri.

Boyes tolitere na mpaghara Tzaneen na Pretoria na South Africa wee gaa n'ihu mụọ ihe ọkpụkpụ na Mahadum Pretoria wee nweta nzere na Fine Arts. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kụziri nka na Bekee na Hout Bay.
Boyes hapụrụ nkuzi na 1989 mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri atọ na ise iji lekwasị anya n'ịtọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ iji mepụta ma mepụta ọrụ aka site n'ụlọ ya na Cape Town
Malite na ọla eji ụrọ na cuttlefish mee wee gaa n'ihu ịmepụta ihe mbụ ya maka ire ere site na ọla kọpa

Ọ malitere ire ọrụ ya site na ụlọ ahịa dị na Greenmarket Square.  Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1992, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepere ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya na Limpopo, nke sochiri ya bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ ha meghere na Paarden Eiland, Cape Town.  Ka ọ na-erule oge ọ nwụrụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ etoola ruo ụlọ ahịa iri anọ na ise na South Africa ebe ngwaahịa ya na-ere na mba iri ise na otu.
